title: Export logic analyzer data to protocol analyzer
content: Probably I'm little ot but I'm unsure where to ask this. Is there any easy (already working) way to export my logic analyzer data (vcd format) to a protocol analyzer like Wireshark? I'm analyzing an USB stream.

comments.text: Have you tried sigrok program (sigrok.org)? It has support for vcd format and is able to decode USB protocol.
Nope, I'll give it a try! Thanks
It's a bit unhandly, as my native logic analyzer program. I would like to use something more protocol oriented like Wireshark.
As far as I remember there is pulseview program that allows to load vcd format and attach protocol decoders on top. Would you mind sharing example vcd file?

It has been my first try, It's very nice looking program, but I need a tool to analyze protocol flow... and list / filter them so I can get the big picture. Scroll ahead and back through packetes with pulseview is a pain.
